properties.entry: SELECT A.ROOM_NO , A.ROOM_PRICE , A.EXCLUSIVE_AREA , A.ADDRESS , A.ROOM_FLOOR , A.ROOM_TITLE , B.THUMBNAIL_PATH FROM TBL_ROOM A JOIN TBL_ROOM_FILE B ON (A.ROOM_NO = B.ROOM_NO) WHERE A.ROOM_STATUS = 'Y' AND B.FILE_NO = 1 ORDER BY A.ROOM_NO DESC
UPDATE /* com.sabang.findMyRoom.room.model.dao.RoomDAO#incrementRoomCount(); */ TBL_ROOM A SET A.VIEW_NO = (SELECT B.VIEW_NO FROM TBL_ROOM B WHERE ROOM_NO = ? ) + 1 WHERE A.ROOM_NO = ?

SELECT /* com.sabang.findMyRoom.room.model.dao.RoomDAO#selectRoomDetail() */ A.ROOM_NO , A.ROOM_PRICE , A.EXCLUSIVE_AREA , A.ADDRESS , TRUNC(SYSDATE - A.CREATE_DATE) AS CREATE_DATE , A.CATEGORY_NO , B.CATEGORY_NAME , A.OFFICE_NO , C.OFFICE_NAME , C.OFFICE_ADDR , C.OFFICE_PHONE , C.BUSINESS_NO , C.OFFICE_RATING , C.USER_NO , D.NICKNAME , A.ROOM_FLOOR , A.DIRECTION , A.MONTH_COST , A.ELECTRICITY_YN , A.GAS_YN , A.WATER_YN , A.INTERNET_YN , A.TV_YN , TO_CHAR(A.CONSTRUCTION_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CONSTRUCTION_DATE , A.AVAILABLE_DATE , A.ROOM_TITLE , A.ROOM_EXPLANATION , A.TRANSPORTATION_INFO , A.WASHING_MACHINE_YN , A.REFRIGERATOR_YN , A.AIR_CONDITIONER_YN , A.GAS_STOVE_YN , A.PET_YN , A.ELEVATOR_YN , A.PARKING_YN , A.VIEW_NO , E.FILE_NO , E.ORIGIN_NAME , E.SAVE_NAME , E.SAVE_PATH , E.THUMBNAIL_PATH FROM TBL_ROOM A JOIN TBL_ROOM_CATEGORY B ON (A.CATEGORY_NO = B.CATEGORY_NO) JOIN TBL_OFFICE C ON (A.OFFICE_NO = C.OFFICE_NO) JOIN TBL_USER D ON (C.USER_NO = D.USER_NO) JOIN TBL_ROOM_FILE E ON (A.ROOM_NO = E.ROOM_NO) WHERE A.ROOM_NO = ? AND D.USER_STATUS = 'Y' AND E.FILE_NO != 1
SELECT /* com.sabang.findMyRoom.room.model.dao.RoomDAO#selectOfficeNo() */ A.OFFICE_NO FROM TBL_OFFICE A JOIN TBL_USER B ON (A.USER_NO = B.USER_NO) WHERE B.USER_NO = ?

INSERT /* com.sabang.findMyRoom.room.model.dao.RoomDAO#insertRoom() */ INTO TBL_ROOM A ( A.ROOM_NO , AROOM_PRICE , AEXCLUSIVE_AREA , AADDRESS , ACATEGORY_NO , AOFFICE_NO , AROOM_FLOOR , ADIRECTION , AMONTH_COST , AELECTRICITY_YN , AGAS_YN , AWATER_YN , AINTERNET_YN , ATV_YN , ACONSTRUCTION_DATE , AAVAILABLE_DATE , AROOM_TITLE , AROOM_EXPLANATION , ATRANSPORTATION_INFO , AWASHING_MACHINE_YN , AREFRIGERATOR_YN , AAIR_CONDITIONER_YN , AGAS_STOVE_YN , APET_YN , AELEVATOR_YN , APARKING_YN ) VALUES ( SEQ_ROOM_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
INSERT INTO TBL_ROOM_FILE A ( A.ROOM_NO , A.FILE_NO , A.ORIGIN_NAME , A.SAVE_NAME , A.SAVE_PATH , A.THUMBNAIL_PATH ) VALUES ( ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )

SELECT /* com.sabang.findMyRoom.room.model.dao.RoomDAO#selectManagementList(); */ A.ROOM_NO , A.ROOM_PRICE , A.ROOM_STATUS , A.EXCLUSIVE_AREA , A.ADDRESS , B.CATEGORY_NAME , A.ROOM_FLOOR , A.ROOM_TITLE , C.THUMBNAIL_PATH FROM TBL_ROOM A JOIN TBL_ROOM_CATEGORY B ON (A.CATEGORY_NO = B.CATEGORY_NO) JOIN TBL_ROOM_FILE C ON (A.ROOM_NO = C.ROOM_NO) JOIN TBL_OFFICE D ON (A.OFFICE_NO = D.OFFICE_NO) JOIN TBL_USER E ON (D.USER_NO = E.USER_NO) WHERE C.FILE_NO = 1 AND E.USER_NO = ? ORDER BY A.ROOM_STATUS DESC, A.ROOM_NO DESC
UPDATE /* com.sabang.findMyRoom.room.model.dao.RoomDAO#changeStatus(); */ TBL_ROOM A SET A.ROOM_STATUS = ? WHERE A.ROOM_NO = ?

UPDATE /* com.sabang.findMyRoom.room.model.dao.RoomDAO#updateRoom() */ TBL_ROOM A SET A.ROOM_PRICE = ? , A.EXCLUSIVE_AREA = ? , A.ADDRESS = ? , A.CATEGORY_NO = ? , A.OFFICE_NO = ? , A.ROOM_FLOOR = ? , A.DIRECTION = ? , A.MONTH_COST = ? , A.ELECTRICITY_YN = ? , A.GAS_YN = ? , A.WATER_YN = ? , A.INTERNET_YN = ? , A.TV_YN = ? , A.CONSTRUCTION_DATE = ? , A.AVAILABLE_DATE = ? , A.ROOM_TITLE = ? , A.ROOM_EXPLANATION = ? , A.TRANSPORTATION_INFO = ? , A.WASHING_MACHINE_YN = ? , A.REFRIGERATOR_YN = ? , A.AIR_CONDITIONER_YN = ? , A.GAS_STOVE_YN = ? , A.PET_YN = ? , A.ELEVATOR_YN = ? , A.PARKING_YN = ? WHERE A.ROOM_NO = ?

UPDATE /* com.sabang.findMyRoom.room.model.dao.RoomDAO#updateFile() */ TBL_ROOM_FILE A SET A.ORIGIN_NAME = ? , A.SAVE_NAME = ? , A.SAVE_PATH = ? , A.THUMBNAIL_PATH = ? WHERE A.ROOM_NO = ? AND A.FILE_NO = ?
DELETE /* com.sabang.findMyRoom.room.model.dao.RoomDAO#updateFile() */ FROM TBL_ROOM_FILE A WHERE A.ROOM_NO = ? AND A.FILE_NO = ?
INSERT /* com.sabang.findMyRoom.room.model.dao.RoomDAO#addWish() */ INTO TBL_PICK_ROOM A ( A.USER_NO , A.ROOM_NO ) VALUES ( ? , ? )
DELETE /* com.sabang.findMyRoom.room.model.dao.RoomDAO#removeWish() */ FROM TBL_PICK_ROOM A WHERE A.USER_NO = ? AND A.ROOM_NO = ?
SELECT /* com.sabang.findMyRoom.room.model.dao.RoomDAO#selectWishlist() */ A.USER_NO , A.ROOM_NO FROM TBL_PICK_ROOM A WHERE A.USER_NO = ? AND ROOM_NO = ?

SELECT /* com.sabang.findMyRoom.room.model.dao.RoomDAO#selectRoomWishList() */ A.ROOM_NO , A.ROOM_PRICE , A.EXCLUSIVE_AREA , A.ADDRESS , A.ROOM_FLOOR , A.ROOM_TITLE , B.THUMBNAIL_PATH FROM TBL_ROOM A JOIN TBL_ROOM_FILE B ON (A.ROOM_NO = B.ROOM_NO) JOIN TBL_PICK_ROOM C ON (A.ROOM_NO = C.ROOM_NO) WHERE A.ROOM_STATUS = 'Y' AND B.FILE_NO = 1 AND C.USER_NO = ? ORDER BY A.ROOM_NO DESC
